name: Project DELTA (itch)
description:
Lord Jupiter has threatened the earth with his new superweapon - the Chi Beam. You venture out into space on a mission to destroy the weapon and save eath. But while passing through the asteroid belt, your fuel tank gets hit by an asteroid, forcing you to make an emergency landing on mars. In order to find fuel and repair it, you will have to get in contact with the martians. And they don't seem to be friendly.

GAMEPLAY:

Project Delta is a 2D sidescroller about exploring mars. Apart from the arrow key, the game is played using only one button (J / Z). Still, the main character DELTA is equipped with a diverse set of abilities:

  • Scratching  -  Pressing (J / Z) on the ground makes DELTA attack with her claws. Combos can be made by performing several attacks in a row or attacking while moving.
  • Diving  -  If you press (J / Z) while the air, DELTA will dive downwards. This gives you a lot of momentum and is useful when you want to jump extra far. It also deals damage to enemies.
  • Climbing - Some walls have bumps on them. Moving against these walls will make DELTA grab onto them. You can then hold up or down to climb, allowing you to reach new heights or safely descend downwards.

More abilities can be unlocked by purchasing upgrades.

INFO:
  • Playtime:  30 - 60 min
  • Engine:  Gamemaker Studio 2
  • Input:  Controller / Keyboard
  • Features: A game
  • Development time: 5 years
CREDITS:
  • Ivar Ängquist: art, music and code
  • Knut Lundin: art and music
  • Natan Söderström: art
  • Theodor Vogel: music
